#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
using namespace std;
vector<pair<long long int,int> > v;
map<unsigned long long int,int> mm;
  map<unsigned long long int,int> :: iterator it;
int ans[10004];
int main()
{
int n,q;
unsigned long long int s,m;
unsigned long long int mul;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{scanf("%llu %llu",&s,&m);
 mul=s*m;
mm[mul]++;
//for(it=mm.begin();it!=mm.end();it++)
//printf("%llu %d",it->first,it->second);
//v[i].first=mul;
//v[i].second=i+1;
v.push_back(make_pair(mul,i+1));
}
scanf("%d",&q);
sort(v.begin(),v.end());
int f=0;
for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++)
{f=0;
	if(mm[v[i].first]==1)
	{ans[n-i]=v[i].second;
	// printf("if  ip=%d rank=%d\n ",n-i,ans[n-i]);
	}else
	{f=1;
	int cnt=mm[v[i].first];
	int k=i;
	int f=i+cnt-1;
	for(int j=k;j<k+cnt;j++)
	{
	
	ans[n-j]=v[f--].second;
	//f--;
//	printf("else  ip=%d rank=%d\n ",n-j,ans[n-j]);
	i++;
	}
}if(f==1)
i-=1;


}int qu;
	for(int t=0;t<q;t++)
	{
	scanf("%d",&qu);
	printf("%d\n",ans[qu]);
	}
return 0;
}
